name: Dalruan: World of Magic
description:
Welcome to the Dalruan: World of Magic

An Adventure of Realms and Monsters.
Gather all 8 Elemental Orbs and Protect them from the Darkness and his Evil Servant Sargoth.

Choose between a Male or Female Protagonist.
Action Combat.
Collect Herbs, Key Items and Quest Items.
Mine 6 Different types of Ore and Merge them into Stronger Variations.
Fish using 6 Levels of Fishing Poles and Bait types.
Craft over 250+ different Weapons, Helmets, Armor, Shields, Rings and Items.
Select from 8 Different Elements (Fire, Ice, Lightning, Earth, Poison, Dark, Undead and Holy).
Gigantic World Map with Many, Many Locations and Quests.
Epic boss battles. Navigate horrid caves, dungeons and ruins.

Join the ever advancing Realm of Dalruan.
